name: snore
effect: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.
flavor_text.emerald: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An attack that can be used only while asleep. It may cause flinching.
